mapper.sql: a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.id AS "id", a.typ AS "typ", a.agent AS "agent", a.level AS "level", a.current_follower_id AS "currentFollowerId"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jy_customer( create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, remarks, id, typ, agent, level, current_follower_id ) VALUES ( #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks}, #{id}, #{typ}, #{agent}, #{level}, #{currentFollowerId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE jy_customer SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, typ = #{typ}, agent = #{agent}, level = #{level}, current_follower_id = #{currentFollowerId} WHERE id = #{id}
